name: CART SURFER
comment: "Dude, I'm totally gonna get like 500 coins this time," says a penguin ripping down the track. "I run through the cave and get sweet air with my 360s and backflips."

name: COFFEE SHOP
comment: "Many of our customers come here for some quiet while they read the latest newspaper," explains a staff member. "Ballistic biscotti is our most popular menu item."

name: ASTRO-BARRIER
comment: "I remember when Astro-Barrier came out. It was the first arcade game on the island!" recalls an avid gamer in the Lounge. "Have you found the secret levels yet?"

name: HOT CHOCOLATE
comment: "The trick to a great cup of coffee is the time it takes to pour," explains the Coffee Stop staff. "Not too fast but not too slow, then save some room for marshmallows!"

name: LANDING PAD
comment: "The landing pads around the island are built out of special alloys that disable them from being adversely affected by jet pack heat," explains Gary. "That means they're strong."

name: PIZZA CHEF
comment: "First you start with the pizza dough, which gets flattened into pans," the chef continues. "Then it goes down the Pizzatron 3000 line and roasts in the oven."

name: PAINT BY LETTERS
comment: "This one's my favorite story in the Book Room because it's about my favorite day of the year," he says. "Besides, I love any story that involves aliens and flashlights."

name: MINE
comment: "The Mine is so cool. I can see all kinds of stalactites on the ceiling," explains the scientist. "Stalactites are those things that look like icicles. Oh wait... they're just icicles."

name: CONSTRUCTION WORKER
comment: "It's amazing what you can do with a plain old drill," notes a worker on a job site near the coast. "I've seen some nice red ones, but I like my trusty yellow drill. It does just the trick."

name: JET PACK ADVENTURE
comment: "I love going on adventures with my jet pack. I can almost navigate through the entire course without getting a single coin," boasts the proud pilot. "It's not too easy, though..."

name: GIFT SHOP
comment: "I come in at least twice a week, I'd say," concludes the shopping penguin, decked out in the latest styles. "The diva glasses and The Sidetied wig are must haves."

name: HIKING IN THE FOREST
comment: "It's the perfect day for a hike in the Forest," says the penguin, holding her backpack on her shoulders. "Keeping active is really important, plus I love the great outdoors!"

name: RESCUE SQUAD
comment: "When you've got a penguin who's stuck in the snow / Just tell 'em exactly where to go / To the Rescue Squad on top of the hill / We know how to help and ya know we will!"

name: PET SHOP
comment: "This here is the puffle area, You'll be responsible for caring for these little critters," explains the Pet Shop owner. "The black one over there is a bit of a firecracker."

name: SKI VILLAGE
comment: "I usually start a tour here at the Ski Village because it's so close to my tour booth," explains a tour guide. It's a great place to build a group of tourists, too."

name: ICE HOCKEY
comment: It's the day of the big game at the Sports Party as Team Red and Blue square off head-to-head. "This time the trophy belongs to Red!" shouts the challenger as the puck drops.

name: SKI HILL
comment: "This must be the place she was talking about with all the sledding penguins," says the red penguin. "Now what on earth is that pointy thing up there for?"

name: SNOWBALL FIGHT
comment: "Here comes a long one!" one penguin shouts. "Yikes! That was close!" shrieks the other penguin. "Guess I'm better with water balloons..."

name: SNOW FORTS
comment: "I'm practicing my snowball pitch. I pretend this is the pitcher's mound, then wind up and let it fly. The Snow Forts are the perfect place to test out your pitching arm.

name: SOCCER
comment: "Okay, look. Let's get this straight. I know some penguins out west call it a soccer ball, but it's football. Now that you understand the game, ready to try and score a goal?"

name: BEACH
comment: "I remember when the Beach opened as though it was yesterday," replies one island veteran. "We threw a big barbecue with the fish we caught. Ahhh... those were golden days..."

name: FOOTBALL
comment: "10... 24... 5... hut!" shouts the quarterback as he makes a run for it across the field, racing for the 10-yard line. "Team Red's not gonna win it this time," he thinks as he's running...

name: BASEBALL
comment: "BATTER UP!" shouts the umpire as Team Red's pitcher readies the first throw of the big ball game. "This one's for the Blue Team!" shouts the batter as the ball flies towards the plate...

name: EMERALD PRINCESS
comment: "Welcome to my beautiful enchanted castle!" beams the sparkly princess penguin. "I'm looking for my wand, which I seem to have misplaced. Could you help me look for it?"

name: BEAN COUNTERS
comment: "Why do they insist on delivering more fish?!" exclaims the employee catching the order from the delivery truck. "Is it just me or are there more fish than java bags here?"

name: MANHOLE COVER
comment: "When you lift this manhole cover up, you'll see that it leads down to the pool," explains the Tour Guide. "And since we're not using out maps right now, shall we continue?"

name: NEWSPAPER ARCHIVES
comment: "Sometimes I don't get a chance to read the newspaper, so I catch up with the past issues in the Boiler Room," says the lime green penguin. "I don't want to miss any comics!"

name: UNDERGROUND POOL
comment: "Hey, do you remember when there wasn't a pool in here?" asks one of the penguins. "I remember a party where we were dancing on the ground in this very spot!"

name: SCUBA DIVING
comment: "While Rockhopper travels at seas to find treasures, I prefer to search at home," the diver explains. "See! Check it out! A coral crown thing! Diving totally rules."

name: ICE FISHING
comment: "I think the last time I was here, I caught about 10 fish," he replies. "I'm not in a rush when I go fishing. To me, it's about fun, not finance. If I need coins, I help at the Pet Shop."

name: CASE OF THE MISSING COINS
comment: "You totally saved my feathers there," sighs the relieved rookie agent. "I thought I was never going to get back into the vault after I closed the door! Oops, I guess!"

name: CRATES AND BOXES
comment: "EVERYONE MAKE WAY FOR BOXMAN!" shouts the penguin in the superhero mask. "I shall put all evildoers into my superboxes for shipment to 'No More Bad Guys Land'!"

name: ANVIL SMITH
comment: The residents of Club Penguin appreciate a good anvil – that's why so many are sent to the Coffee Shop every day. "I'd say I make about 30 on a good day," replies one anvil smith.

name: HALLOWEEN
comment: "Check it out! I'm a ghost bunny professor!" explains the orange penguin. "I want to have the coolest costume for this solar eclipse party at my buddy's igloo. Do you think I'll win?"

name: KNIGHT
comment: "Let's pretend to be knights and princesses. I'll be the Knight of Light and you can be the Princess of Power," says the green penguin. "Oh no! Here comes a dragon..."

name: BLACK PUFFLE
comment: "Turbo is my black puffle. It rolls its eyes a lot," replies the penguin as he feeds his pet a flipper full of Puffle O's. "It really gets fired up when I take it out for a walk."

name: MEDIEVAL PARTY
comment: "For this event we collaborated with Penguin Style's fashion designers to make an epic party," says one planner, dressed in a knight's garb. "I still wear my party clothes today."

name: BLUE PUFFLE
comment: "As an employee, I value the blue puffles," replies the staff member. "They are loyal, easy to take care of, and fun to play ball with. You can't go wrong with a blue puffle."

name: PINK PUFFLE
comment: "This is my pink puffle, Cutie! I named it that because I think its eyes are sooo adorable," continues the ballet dancer. "Plus it matches my outfit!"

name: GREEN PUFFLE
comment: "My puffle Greenie is the silliest puffle I've ever met, which is why we get along so well," she giggles. "I love it when it plays on its unicycle – it's so funny!"

name: PUFFLE FURNITURE
comment: "No igloo would be complete without accessories for your cute little puffle pets," the decorator explains. "Puffles love having furniture just as much as penguins!"

name: PURPLE PUFFLE
comment: "Oh! Look at that one over there blowing bubbles! That one is sooo cute – it should be my pet," she exclaims. "I'll name it Princess Purple because I love princesses and purple!"

name: RED PUFFLE
comment: "This is my sidekick on my adventures. I named it Fireball because it's so fast when it goes flying out of its cannon like whoooosh! Look, it's going again!"

name: YELLOW PUFFLE
comment: "I knew I wanted a yellow puffle from the moment I saw it in the Forest at Halloween," she replies. "My puffle Lemon likes to paint just like I do."

name: SUMMER PARTY[1]
comment: "The Summer Party sticks out the most in my mind as the one to beat," proclaims one penguin. "You can't top great buddies acting crazy and having fun."

name: GRAY FISH
comment: "You ain't gonna get a bite without the Flashing Lure, sonny," the experienced brown fisherman explains. "Them gray ones are only attracted to real bright light."

name: O BERRY
comment: "These berries grow on shrubs in the forest clearing," explains our nature guide. "Puffles love to eat them because of their tart sweetness."

name: LIFE RING
comment: "Having a life ring handy is really important to us," the lifeguard continues as she keeps watch over the Pool. "Hey, that crab is knocking on the glass over there!"

name: JOLLY ROGER FLAG
comment: "Arrr, this be the black flag atop me ship," growls Rockhopper as we tour the Migrator. "I be liking to name things, so I be callin' this one the Jolly Roger."

name: COINS
comment: "Coins are the widely accepted monetary system around the island," explains the scholarly account penguin. "That means penguins use them to buy stuff."

name: GARY THE GADGET GUY
comment: "I have been conducting research on the combustion of hydrogen and oxygen," Gary continues. "Jet pack fuel is important on the island as it allows penguins to adventure."

name: BUOYS
comment: "I'm trying to find the elusive Boo-Eee #4," replies the penguin sleuth. "They're hidden all over, and I think they're supposed to protect the island from bad weather or something."

name: YARR
comment: "Me beloved best buddy Yarr has been by me side e'er since we met on Rockhopper Island," the burly captain replies. "It be a loyal friend, keepin' watch me Crow's Nest."

name: KLUTZY
comment:
Klutzy: "CLICK CLICK CLICK."
Crab Translator 3000: "I'm hungry."
Klutzy: "CLA-CLICKA-CLICK CLICK-CLICK."
Crab Translator 3000: "I'm still hungry."

name: HERBERT P. BEAR
comment: "Why hello there, penguin. It is I, Herbert P. Bear, Esquire. Aren't you fortunate to have discovered my magnificent card. I am confident that you will treasure this picture."

name: HOT SAUCE
comment: "It is I, the alien Dojo master, hai ya! I will reveal to you the hidden ingredient of my pizza masterpieces... the amazing Hot Sauce – guaranteed to spice up any dish!"

name: SNOW CASTLE
comment: "I think it took like a day and a half to make this," recalls one snow artist. "I don't really remember. I just know that we had to test to make sure penguins could walk on it."

name: AUNT ARCTIC
comment: "Hello! Aloha! Oi! I am so exhilarated to have my photograph taken for such a prestigious event. This is my desk, where I read the letters I receive and wrestle with writer's block."

name: CHRISTMAS CAROLS
comment: "Ooooh eee oooooh!" sing the carolers as they practice their songs to serenade the town. During the holidays, the trees are trimmed with fresh snow and holiday cheer echoes throughout the island.

name: BETA PARTY
comment: "We didn't have many decorations then – just a simple banner," explains a penguin wearing a party hat. "But we wanted to celebrate our hard work somehow, and penguins love a good party!"

name: HIDDEN ITEMS
comment: "I found the hidden viking helmet!" he says, leafing through the latest issue of Penguin Style. "I'm totally going to add this to my pirate policeman outfit. What do you think?"

name: SECRET AGENT
comment: "One rule we have about being a secret agent is that you don't talk about secret agents," says the tight-billed penguin in the suit. "No other comments at this time."

name: SNOW SHOVEL
comment: "I never go anywhere without my trusty shovel. I know a lot of penguins prefer their drills, but I get a sense of reward using my shovel to move the snow around."

name: THE MIGRATOR
comment: "Arrr mateys! Ye be gazin' at me good ship, the Migrator! It be a mighty ship of vim and vigor that has lasted many tumbles," replies Rockhopper. "Nary a better boat there be."

name: CAPTAIN ROCKHOPPER
comment: "Arrr... ye be gazin' at me glorious card. Ahhhh, a sight for sore eyes this fantastic photo be. It be remindin' me of many voyages across the seas with treasures seized!"

name: ICE CREAM
comment: "There I am eating ice cream at the Beach again!" exclaims the penguin as she gets her beach towel ready. "Yes, it's true, ice cream and the Beach are a great pair."

name: MULLET
comment: "Penguins from far and wide come to this ice fishing hole to see if they can catch this legendary big fish. Someone told me I need bigger bait though, so I brought a pizza."

name: UNDERGROUND FLOOD
comment: "Oh no! That crab over there tapped the glass and now there's a leak and there's water pouring out and there's going to be water everywhere what are we going to do now!?"

name: FLUFFY THE FISH
comment: "Here fishy fishy fishy!" calls the red penguin. "I don't think Fluffy has ears," his friend replies. "Neither do we, but I can hear you..." "Hmmm. Guess you've got a point there."

name: SHARK
comment: "I know there's a big fish down there, but I don't think it's that one with the great big mean teeth and shark fin on top," the rookie fisherman says. "That's not Mullet, is it?"

name: BLAST
comment: "Dude. Soooo love the shades. They make me even stronger and more silent. Maybe later we can hang out and I'll eat a Puffle O to entertain 'ya."

name: FLARE
comment: "You think this is fast? You should see how I move when I get shot from a cannon! It's a riot! And I think, actually, it increases happiness."

name: CHIRP
comment: "Paints, creativity, and music," Chirp replies with whimsy. "Mix those together and you got a masterpiece, my friends, a masterpiece!"

name: POP
comment: "I love bubbles! They're beautiful to blow. Bouncy. Breathtaking. Transparent perfection, I say!"

name: LOOP
comment: "Hmm... I wonder if my lasso would work the same under water. I mean, it'd be super cool to see if I could round up some pearls, wouldn't it?

name: FLIT
comment: "Um, nope! Can't touch this propeller hat," Flit laughs loudly. "It takes tons of practice... Even I need it! Recall Christmas 2008 when I got stuck sideways in a tree?!"

name: BOUNCER
comment: "It's so cool to bounce around like my ball," he declares. "By the way... it rolled under a ginormous pile of snow and though I'm small, round and can roll, I'm a bit too puffy. Can you help?"

name: ED MCCOOL AND DESTRUCTO
comment: "Dear Gary, met two very talented puffles on an important PSA mission today. Will have to keep a look out for them in the future. They may be useful someday..."

name: NIBLET
comment: "From this snowman emerges the almighty Niblet, the might green puffle! He's been trying to become a white puffle by hiding in the snow."

name: SNOWY NIGHT
comment: Penguins and puffles never get tired of the snow falling in Club Penguin. Best friends like to take some timeout from their busy life to watch it fall together.

name: PUFFLES ON THE LOOSE
comment: Sometimes rounding up puffles feels a little like chasing a rainbow. Lots of colors, but the closer you get the farther away it seems.

name: CADENCE AND THE KEEPER
comment: "Yeah, this little green guy is an epic win," Cadence grinned. "He's got all the right moves. He usually knows where the party's at. He's definitely a Keeper, lolz!"

name: GOLDEN PUFFLE
comment: Such a popular myth, they made a Stage play about it. Does this puffle really live under the 'berg?

name: METEOR PUFFLE
comment: Swoosh, the mysterious meteor puffle flies through the air with the greatest of ease...

name: RAINBOW PUFFLE
comment: A multi-colored legend, or just a creative little yellow puffle who has been playing with paint?

name: ABOMINABLE SNOW PUFFLE
comment: "I'm telling ya, it was huge! Twice the size of a penguin and it had claws like a crab. I was shaking in my snow boots!"

name: Club Penguin Times
comment: "Extra! Extra! Every Thursday the Club Penguin Times delivers the latest scoop on everything that's happening on the island. From fun art to stories to games, there's something new every week!"

name: Can of Worms
comment: Anyone who's planning to go ice fishing behind the Ski Lodge needs a can of worms. Having this squirmy bait ready is the first step to catching a fishy treat.

name: Winter Fiesta Party
comment: "I was at the first Winter Fiesta way back in 2007," she explained. "I missed the one in 2008, so I was totally stoked to see it again in 2009!

name: Invisible Ninja Suit
comment: "The Invisibility Suit is one of the tools of the ninja. Available only from the Martial Artworks store, it allows ninja to vanish into the shadows. Useful AND cool."

name: Penguin Mail
comment: Through rain, sleet, and snow, the Penguin Mail will always get through. But mostly through snow... and actually they've never seen rain, but still.

name: Bumble Bee
comment: "This is my favorite Halloween costume, the Bumble Bee! I picked this one up last year when they were on sale at the Gift Shop."

name: Pizzatron 3000
comment: Making pizzas in the Pizza Parlor can be tricky. Chefs need a steady hand and concentration of steel to prepare pizza pies perfectly for all their hungry costumers!

name: Card-Jitsu
comment: To become a ninja, one must first learn to master the elements. It all begins with Card-Jitsu, and this card you hold in your hand. Proceed to the Dojo, and take your first step on a legendary path...

name: Adopt-A-Puffle
comment: Puffles are the cute little furballs you see penguins waddling around with next to them. You can even take them into games like Aqua Grabber! Drop by the Pet Shop in the Plaza to adopt one of your very own.

name: Rock & Roll Suit
comment: This trendy outfit is popular for its sparkle and "pizzazz!" It was first released in the Gift Shop, just before Music Jam '08, one of the biggest parties of the year.

name: Construction
comment: "There's construction going on all over the place in Club Penguin all the time. Penguins on the island love to build and create, so construction is a pretty popular job around here!

name: Hidden Pins
comment: "These charming, limited edition collector's items are a must have for any treasure hunter... a brand new one is hidden every two weeks somewhere on the island!"

name: Treasure Hunt Game
comment: "Rockhopper's Treasure Hunt game is kinda rare. You can only play it when his ship, the Migrator, is docked on the Beach. Remember, you need his key from that book to get into the Quarters on the ship.

name: DJ3K
comment: DJ3K at the Night Club is a music-makin' penguin's favorite game. "It's simple, yo. Just start pushin' buttons and the groove kicks in. Every good beat needs a little cowbell, so I like to mix that into my sets."

name: Surf Boards
comment: "The only thing you need to 'catch some waves' down at the Cove; penguins can borrow a board or buy their own at the Surf Shack. Then they just need to catch a 'gnarly' wave and 'hang ten!'"

name: Beach Chair Chilling
comment: "Chilling out" at the Beach is even easier when the beach is made of snow. Sun glasses are optional, but you add that touch of "cool" while you "chill."

name: Telescope
comment: "If you look through the telescope at the Beacon, you can see all the way out to sea. It's a good place to keep a close eye out for Rockhopper."

name: Fish Costume
comment: "Don't give me that look..." said the penguin. "It's just a costume. I'm trying to get a part in a play at the Stage, and I need expert advice. Now are you going to help me or not?"

name: Crow's Nest
comment: Yarr's favorite place on the Migrator is up in the Crow's Net. You can see for miles, and take out any rogue icebergs with the ship's snowball cannon.

name: The Cove
comment: "Other penguins like to come to the Cove to surf, but I just love to gaze out at the water. I was the first one to spot a huge storm one time through the binoculars! The ocean can tell you a lot."

name: Captain's Quarters
comment: "Rockhopper used to keep his quarters locked," the tour guide says. "But now you just need to find his key to get in..."

name: Iceberg
comment: "If we tipped this over, what do you think we'd find on the other side?" one penguin inquires. "It's the biggest mystery of all," they replied. "We've got to find a way to tip it.

name: The Lounge
comment: The Lounge is located upstairs from the Night Club, and it's the perfect place to "chill" and play arcade games. Can you master the tricky "Thin Ice" or pilot the "Astro Barrier" to victory?

name: Rockhopper's Key
comment: "Arr! Ye be needin' this special key to get into me Captain's Quarters on me good ship the Migrator!" Rockhopper chuckled. "I hid it somewhere on the island. Ye might want to "book" some time to find it..."

name: Penguins That Time Forgot[2]
comment: "Dinosaurs, lava, time-traveling... this was one of my favorite plays," she explained. "Watch this, I'll be a cave penguin... 'GRUB! FIRE ROAST MARSHMALLOW!'"

name: Team Blue Rally
comment: Rallying at the Stage for epic competitions, the Red Team and Blue Team wrote another chapter of their rivalry with the introduction of their moose mascots.

name: Jet Pack Adventure
comment: "For those looking to experience the thrill of flying, look no further than Jet Pack Adventure," said the Tour Guide. "Just head to the top of the Lighthouse, strap on a pack, and take off! Parachutes provided!"

name: Ruby and the Ruby
comment: "See, here's the shimmy – this classy lady named Ruby had lost her ruby. A victim of poetic irony, I know. She needed my help, and she needed it fast..." -Jacques Hammer

name: Snowball Fight
comment: Snowballs can be used for all types of purposes, from snowball fights to tennis matches. "I like to throw rapid-fire by hitting 'T' on my keyboard constantly. TURBO THROW!"

name: Snowball Press
comment: "The Snowball Press publishes all the great books Club Penguin has to offer, like Rockhopper's Journal and Penguin Tales. Check 'em out in the room above the Coffee Shop. Remember: every word counts!"

name: Music Jam
comment: "I love a good music festival," he responded. "Music Jam 2008 was probably my favorite party. I finally got to meet Penguin Band, and DJ3K came out for the first time!"

name: Puffle Chew-Chew
comment: "My black puffle just loves the scratching post I bought him from the Pet Shop. But I can't figure out why he keeps trying to eat it! Maybe I need to feed him some Puffle O's."

name: Fairy Fables
comment: "My fave play's definitely Fairy Fables, cuz it's got the Big Bad Wool costume in it. I wear the sheep costume and my buddy dresses up like the prince from the story and we make up our own plays in the Forest."

name: Jelly Fish
comment: These rare Antarctic jelly fish can produce a small electric charge that can make for a 'shocking' experience for Ice Fishing experts who may snag one on their line.

name: Pirate
comment: "Arr! Only the bravest penguins join me pirate crew!" says Rockhopper. "Smartly now, sailors – where be yer sea flippers?"

name: Fish Bait
comment: The fish around Club Penguin won't just up and eat and old bait. In fact, each kind of fish has their own favorite food. Fishing experts recommend trying different types of bait for best results.

name: Hydro Hopper
comment: "Catchin' a ride on the ol' Hydro Hopper at the Dock is sweet," the Tour Guide explained. "Catching air and sailing over obstacles is not only fun, but will earn you extra coins. Come on, give it a try!"

name: Puffle O's
comment: "Though puffles enjoy cookies, and a stick of gum now and then, their favorite food is Puffle O's, without a doubt," said the Puffle Handler. "Make sure not to overfeed them though, because they might get a tummy ache."

name: Fall Fair Games
comment: "Once a year the Fall Fair comes to Club Penguin with a whole bunch of special games," said the Tour Guide. "These games award tickets you can trade for sweet prizes. And I mean 'sweet.' Their cotton candy is delicious!"

name: Thinga-ma-jig 3000
comment: "Oh, you've heard of the Thing-ma-jig 3000?" Gary asked. "Oh yes, it's quite a clever little device, but it's hidden away in my Gadget Room. It's so well hidden in that you'd have to be some kind of secret agent to find it."

name: Rad Scientist
comment: This unique Halloween costume first appeared in October 2008, when Gary the Gadget Guy was working on the Monster Maker 3000 invention in his secret lab. "Spookalicious!"

name: Quip and Qua
comment: "Truly we are the most bizarre costumes that can be purchased from the Stage..." scoffed Qua. "I don't know..." answered Quip. "I saw a squid monster with a sheep face walking around." "Well," replies Qua, "other than that guy..."

name: Twee
comment: The fairy storyteller from the Fairy Fables play at the Stage. Twee loves to mix things up to keep it fresh – from colors to stories, things are never quite ordinary in her library!

name: Coins For Change
comment: "They say it's better to give than to receive and that's totally tree with Coins for Change. There's always amazing amounts of generosity when penguins decide to change the world! Waddle around and make difference!"

name: Surfing with the Sharks
comment: "And I was like, woah, it's a shark! And it was like 'RAH!' and then I was like whoa, it's a shark! And you shoulda seen it man. I mean, it was huge – it was mahoosive!"

name: Dance Contest
comment: "Any penguin brave enough to stand up, talk the talk, walk the walk, and bust out their icy best moves is an epic win here in the Dance Club."

name: Purple Octopus
comment: "What's wackier than an octopus showing up in the middle of a party? Nothing! That's epic wacky! This inflatable octopus tends to show up at the strangest of times, so keep your eyes open for other appearances!"

name: Giant Squid
comment: "I'm telling you, the Squid is totally real. I was deep below the Iceberg in the Aqua Grabber one day when it went zipping past me going 'EAAAUUUUURGGGGH!'. We need to find it!"

name: Camera
comment: This item is sometimes found in the Costume Trunk at the Stage. Once you have a camera, wave to snap award-winning photos all over the island.

name: Wigs
comment: All wigs can be found in Penguin Style catalog in the Gift Shop. Every penguin should have one – from punk to surfer – they really complete an outfit!

name: Pizza Parlor
comment: Be a chef! Make pizzas in the Pizzatron 3000 game in the kitchen. Put on your red apron and dance to serve customers in the restaurant.

name: Coffee Machine
comment: Secret Agents will find this machine in the Coffee Shop during the Secret of the Fur mission. It will help you save the island.

name: Costume Trunk
comment: You'll find this at the Stage – and it's never empty! Open it and choose an outfit. You could be a brave explorer, a scientist, a lobster, a hero, a time traveler... anything you want![3]

name: Pet Shop Staff
comment: The employees in the Pet shop love looking after puffles! With the orange apron on, you can dance to serve them food. Look for it from time to time in Penguin Style.

name: Stompin' Bob
comment: The laid back bass player of Penguin Band. He keeps the beat with bandmate G Billy and loves to play the jazzy stuff.

name: G Billy
comment: The founder of and drummer for Penguin Band. If you ever get the chance to meet him Backstage during Music Jam and be sure to get an autographed background by clicking his player card!

name: Outdoor Igloo
comment: Penguins with outdoor areas for their igloos can throw amazing parties. Check out Better Igloos for cool furniture, like this BBQ. Oh the gnome? Every party should have one!

name: Ticket Booth
comment: You never know who will sell you a ticket for the latest Stage performance at the Plaza. Sometimes actors man the booth between shows!

name: Ridge Run
comment: It's the toughest Sled Racing run on the Ski Hill. Up to four penguins can race together, so if you're serious about challenging your buddies, this is the way to do it!

name: Clock Tower
comment: Ready, set, throw snow! Find this snowball-powered clock in the Snow Forts. Throw snowballs at the target to help keep it powered. Just press T on your keyboard and click the red target!"

name: White Puffles
comment: First discovered in February '09, these critters are known to be gentle but powerful. Adopt one from the Pet Shop and discover what it can turn to ice with a single breath!

name: Dojo Courtyard
comment: This is the outside of the Dojo and it was uncovered by penguins in November 2008. To get here, you must use your map.

name: Rocking Horse
comment: This ginormous rocking horse somehow found itself upstairs in the Lodge Attic. To see it for yourself, go to the Ski Village and climb the ladder inside the Ski Lodge.

name: Penguin Style
comment: There's new stuff in this catalog every month! Why not get your friends together in the Gift Shop and check it out? Pick out new outfits, then hold a fashion show in your igloo!

name: Stage Director
comment: Directors needed! Located in the Plaza, the Stage has new plays every month and always needs actors, stagehands, and even directors to make every performance a success. Grab a costume from the catalog and break a leg!

name: Conductor
comment: This outfit showed up in the Penguin Style during Music Jam. When penguins put it on and danced, they conducted orchestras all over the island.

name: Beacon
comment: From the top of the Lighthouse, you can look through the telescope to see if there's sign of Rockhopper's ship or play the game Jet Pack Adventure.

name: Discovering The Underground
comment: There's two secret passages to the underground. You'll find this one in the Plaza. To find the other passage, head to the room with the best beats and pay attention to the speaker on the far right.

name: Franky
comment: This cool lead guitarist of Penguin Band loves to hang out with other music fans around the island. Find him with his bandmates Backstage during Music Jam and receive an autographed background.

name: Petey K.
comment: The talented pianist and accordion player in the Penguin Band. He's always bursting with new song ideas and loves to share them with audiences around the island.

name: Boombox
comment: Penguins learned a new dance with this item when Cadence showed up with it during a party in the Night Club. If you have the item, wear it and press D on your keyboard and see what you can do!

name: Mild Mannered Reporter
comment: This character appears in Shadow Guy and Gamma Gal vs. Squidzoid at the Stage. He's a bit of a shy guy, but he's just as important as the ones with the super powers!

name: The Twelfth Fish
comment: Appearing at the Stage Dec. 2007, this Shakespearean style comedy stared a Bard, a Countess, a Jester and (obviously) a Fish who couldn't stop blubbing. "BUT NEVER DOUBT I BLUB!"

name: April Fool's Day Party
comment: It's a celebration where things happen that can't happen! Discover the wacky and unexpected with friends across the island at this party – from surprise-filled boxes to new dimensions!

name: Plasma Glow Wave
comment: You can light up the Stage with Gamma Gal's incredible Plasma Glow Wave during every performance of Shadow Guy and Gamma Gal vs. Squidzoid. Wear the costume and wave to activate the special power.

name: Cowbell
comment: First available at the Music Jam '09 party, this item is still a hit across the island! To join in the fun, press D on your keyboard while wearing the item.

name: O Berry Bush
comment: Puffles love them and it's a good thing too! When they get hungry it's the best meal to recharge their energy. O'Berries grow in the wild and are always in full supply on your puffle's player card.

name: Chester The Time Traveler
comment: In Penguins that Time Forgot at the Stage, this curious character finds himself on an adventure back in time surrounded by dinosaurs and cave penguins.

name: 101 Days of Fun
comment: There's always a lot to discover around the island and in 2009, for 101 days straight, penguins had fun completing a new activity every day!

name: Color Vote[4]
comment: The 2009 color vote was an epic battle between Lavender, Maroon and Aqua. Penguins voted in the Forest and the winning color was added to the Penguin Style catalog as a new penguin color.

name: Christmas Party
comment: Holiday spirit takes over the island during this party! This is the Photo Booth in the Forest where penguins posed for pictures with Santa.

name: Viking Opera
comment: Be part of this popular Stage show, as a detective, ghost, or even the Viking Opera singer. Put on the Viking wig and dance, following along to the script.

name: Water Balloons
comment: Most penguins have had a snowball fight at the Snow Forts. But at the Water Party, the splat of water balloons replacing the thud of snow. Too cool!

name: Tuba
comment: At the Music Jam '09 party, this item was popular at the Lighthouse stage. When you wore it and danced, you could even hear it playing!

name: Rockhopper's Plants
comment: The captain of the Migrator brought these plants to the island in 2009. Penguins put them in their igloos and they started to grow! Every few weeks they change – even to this day!

name: Adventure Party
comment: During this June 2009 party, after Rockhopper's plants took over the island, penguin explorers discovered rare flowers – some that changed colors and others that liked to eat snowballs!

name: Penguin Play Awards
comment: Penguins called this one of 2009's coolest events. They voted for their favorite stage plays, got to meet Penguin Band and Aunt Arctic, and enjoyed dressing up to receive their own awards!

name: All-Access Pass
comment: During Music Jam '09 party, this pass got penguins into the Backstage and Night Club Rooftop where they hung out with friends and had a chance to meet Penguin Band and Cadence.

name: Cadence's Autograph
comment: Cadence is a very popular penguin around here! She makes appearances at big events like the Penguin Play Awards. You can meet her and receive an autographed background by clicking her player card.

name: Treasure Book
comment: This book contains the best collection of rare and exclusive items. Look for a code with select toys and enter at clubpenguin.com to gain access to this special catalog.

name: Black Hoodie
comment: You might spot more than a few penguins wearing this popular item. When it appears in Penguin Style, the Gift Shop always has plenty in stock!

name: Propellor Cap
comment: Penguins flew for the first time when they danced while wearing this item at the 2006 April Fool's Day Party. Penguins aren't the only ones who like these caps though – check out the green puffles!

name: Dessert Pizza
comment: One of the island's best kept secrets. Make Dessert Pizza in the Pizza Parlor's Pizzatron 3000 game by clicking on the lever of the machine when you enter the game!

name: Black Electric Guitar
comment: This limited edition instrument is available from the Penguin Style catalog in the Gift Shop from time to time. To play it, put it on and dance. Go solo or join a band!

name: Mastering The Elements
comment: Fire. Snow. Water. That's what you'll need to master the Card-Jitsu game. Train with your friends and Sensei at the Dojo to earn belts and become a ninja.

name: Elite Penguin Force
comment: This super-secret agency has one goal: to protect the Club Penguin island. Their base, the Command Room, is hidden near the Ski Village.

name: FLOORING UPGRADE
comment: "I'm rollin' out some burgundy style," says the interior decorator. "I've got some brand new igloo vibe picked out – a totally awesome empurpled cabin of chic. It's gonna be a partay!"

name: GADGET ROOM
comment: "This is my Gadget Room where I store the numerous inventions that I have been working on," explains Gary. "Testing is very important."

name: JACKHAMMER
comment: "Here, I'll demonstrate how it works. You just put on your hat and start to dance," stated the construction penguin. "I'm not sure how it works. I just know that it does."

name: JET PACK
comment: "And this is the Jet Pack, another invention I worked on with a team of scientists," Gary continues. "We initially had a few crash landings, but we've since stabilized the build."

name: THIN ICE
comment: "My favorite part of Thin Ice is the music. I want it in my igloo because I like how it goes 'beep-ba-beep-beep'. The black puffle in it looks really funny, too.

name: NIGHT VISION GOGGLES
comment: "Whoopee! I can see in the dark!" exclaims the penguin wearing fancy solar-powered black and green goggles. "Instead of black I can see all green! It's the coolest thing ever!"

name: MIGHTY PLUNGER
comment: "This is the invention to end all inventions. The Mighty Plunger of Might!" Says the green penguin. "With this great invention you will create mighty tremors and mighty rumbles!"

name: DRAGON
comment: "Hark! Who dost approach my cavern!" growls a penguin, pretending to be a dragon. "Wherefore hast though entered mine cave! Make haste or I shall breathest fire!"

name: SPACE ADVENTURE
comment: "There is something troublesome about the computer after leaving Planet X," Captain Snow thinks to himself. "And Tin Can 3000 has been acting strange lately..."

name: TOUR GUIDE
comment: "And over here we have the Ski Lodge, My buddy and I usually hang out and play Find Four there," the guide continues. "And if you're interested in sports, have I got the place for you..."

name: SLED RACING
comment: "I can catch the sweetest air on this tube; it's awesome. I always aim for the ice because I can go so fast afterwards. Here comes another patch of ice... yeahhhhhhhhh!"

name: PUFFLE ROUND-UP
comment: "Okay, I just need to catch a few more for the Pet Shop. Easy now... steady... steady..." says the penguin, thinking out loud. "It takes real concentration to do this!"

name: AC3000
comment: Do you have snow that just isn't cold enough? Then check out Gary's AC3000 – it's guaranteed to keep the snow in any Attic nice and cool.

name: SNOW GLOBE IGLOO
comment: "Over there is my igloo. I saved up coins for the renovations at Christmas," she explains. "It's empty right now because I'm gearing up to get some new furniture."

name: SHADOW GUY & GAMMA GAL
comment: "It looks like Squidzoid's out to eat the city again, Gamma Gal," smirks Shadow Guy. "It must have forgotten about our super powers... Let's show 'em what we're made of!"

name: AVALANCHE
comment: "I still remember it plain as day. There was this big rumble and all this snow came WOOOSHING down the mountain!" recalls a witness. "We couldn't go sledding for like a week!"

name: WATER PARTY[1]
comment: "Everyone grab your inflatable whales; it's time to slip, slide and swim!" shouts the instructor, blowing on her lifeguard whistle. "Don't forget your water balloons!"

name: CATCHIN' WAVES
comment: "I'm still a bit shaky on this board. I wiped out constantly last time I went out," explains a slightly nervous new surfer. "I don't get how other penguins handle Survival mode!"

name: FIREFIGHTER
comment: "Whew, it's been a really busy day putting out fires at the Cove," wheezes the out-of-break firefighter. "That's why it's important to love what you do."

name: AQUA GRABBER
comment: "I've taken the Aqua Grabber out on many deep sea salvage missions," proclaims the purple penguin. "My pink puffle helps me find the really rare treasures."

name: OCTOPUS
comment: The origin of the mythical giant octopus is unknown. "I remember it like it was last year. All of a sudden, there was a big octopus... like an OCTIZILLA in the Dojo!" recalls one penguin.

name: CACTUS
comment: "We had to ship these here cacti in from way out west," remarks the cowpenguin. "We hadta be careful with these here spiky things, though – they got a real bite to 'em!"

name: TIPPING THE ICEBERG
comment: "I had this amazing dream. In it I was at the 'berg and when I started drilling, the ice started tipping! Penguins were like 'AAH!' and I was like 'KAZAM!' It was awesome!"

name: NINJA
comment: "To be as the moon amongst the shadows, one must follow the code of honor and loyalty. Each movement must be as precise as a dance. Patience is both rewarded and a reward."

name: WHITE PUFFLE
comment: A snowflake. A single sheet of blank paper. A white puffle. Small things can sometimes conceal great power.

name: Yarr
comment: "Avast!" cries Rockhopper. "What be them flares me sees on the horizon? What's that ye say, Yarr? Arr, I think it be a message from me buddies at Club Penguin, too."

name: KEEPER OF THE BOILER ROOM
comment: "Talk about an incredible job," the Keeper exclaims in the middle of a bounce. "Everyday dancing required and a cheerful nature a must..."

name: Penguin Band
comment: G Billy, Petey K, Stompin' Bob and Franky... these four penguins sure know how to rock it out. They get together whenever a Music Jam party is happening and sign autographs for their devoted fans.

name: Dojo Sketch
comment: On April Fool's Day, the penguins were startled. But Sensei reassured: "Pencil Dojo is serene, calm, smart, very cool just like this haiku.

name: Flare Flinger 3000
comment: "I can't wait for Rockhopper to see how we've restored the Migrator to her former glory," commented one penguin as she loaded up the Flare Flinger 3000.

name: Herbert & Klutzy
comment: "I don't know about you, but I really DIG this drill a HOLE lot! HAHAHA! What do you think Klutzy?" Click. Click click. "What do you mean 'bearly'?"

name: Coffee Delivery Truck
comment: "To the left a bit, no, to the right, aah, watch the fish!" yells the delivery guy. "Hey, what's the guy up front doing anyway? And who puts anvils in a delivery truck?"

name: Anniversary Party
comment: "If there's one thing we know how to do around here, it's partying! One party I rarely miss is Club Penguin's anniversary every October 24. There's cake, balloons, and of course, cool party hats!"

name: Halloween Party
comment: "Every year, on a dark and spooky night, penguins from all over the island dress up as ghosts, monsters and even bumble bees. Then they go out trick or treating. Halloween is definitely the strangest time of year!"

name: Sensei
comment: The wisest penguin, knows every journey begins, with a single step. They should also know, that if you speak in haiku, you sound really wise.

name: Jackhammers
comment: "This amazing marvel of penguin mechanics is the tool of choice for construction projects around the island. Just grab a hard hat, and make like you're going to dance. The jackhammer will do the rest.

name: Quest for the Golden Puffle
comment: "Since the beginning of time, penguins have been searching for the legendary Golden Puffle..." said the Tour Guide. "There's even a play at the Stage based on this mysterious myth. Is it real? Will we ever find out?"

name: Storm
comment: "AAHH! What if there's a lot of wind?" "What if there's extra snow?" "What if there sky pours out pounds of candy?!"

name: Rockhopper
comment: "Arr, me hearties! Ahoy! Stand smartly sailors, for you be in the company of the fearless Captain Rockhopper, the best pirate that ever sailed the seven seas. Me and Yarr be hoping to see ye all soon! Arr harr!"

name: Switchbox 3000
comment: One of Gary the Gadget Guy's inventions, this special FX box is found at the Stage. Every switch, button and lever changes the set in a different way.

name: Medieval Party
comment: During the Medieval Party penguins discovered dragons, befriended knights and completed heroic quests.

name: Cadence
comment: Cadence is a popular DJ and she loves to dance. She opened the Night Club's Dance Contest game in 2009, where you can challenge your friends or dance solo.

name: Cloud Wave
comment: Pick up the Cloud Wave Bracer from the Martial Artworks catalog in the Ninja Hideout. Wear them and dance to create mysterious clouds before you turn invisible!

name: Ghost Sheet
comment: You can find this costume in the Gift Shop at Halloween or in the Costume Trunk while Haunting of the Viking Opera is on at the Stage. During the play, this outfit certainly scared the singers!

name: Cart Surfer
comment: The gnarly game can be found in the Mine, where your surf & skate tricks will earn you coins! Hang on for a wild surf ride!

name: Keytar
comment: This Treasure Book instrument is a musical masterpiece! It's pretty rare and you just have to put it on and dance to rock!

name: X-treme Jetpack
comment: You'll see this penguin in the Comics on the community section of the website. He's always looking for a new challenge to take games to the next level – the X-treme!

name: Box Dimension
comment: Penguins can enter this room through the Portal Box item when it is set up in an igloo. This item was available at the 2009 April Fool's Day Party.

name: Gold Viking Helmet
comment: This item is super rare! It's only available once in a while and is usually hidden as a secret in the Penguin Style catalog.

name: Gary The Gadget Guy
comment: Gary is the island's resident inventor. He generally prefers to keep to himself to concentrate on inventing new gadgets. You may have seen a few like the Jet Pack and Pizzatron 3000.

name: Rockhopper's Cannon
comment: "ARR! Me Migrator's mighty cannon is known for many things. Its snowballs defend against icebergs. But in the past, it's also launched cake, candles and even me Puffle, Yarr!"

name: Fire Ninja
comment: To gain your Fire Ninja Suit, you must practice Card-Jitsu Fire, then defeat the Sensei in the final challenge. Do you have what it takes to become a Fire Ninja?

name: Orange Puffle Wagon
comment: When an orange puffle is completely fed and happy, watch out! They tend to unexpectedly take out a mega monster-truck and hit the gas!

name: Haunted House
comment: One dark Halloween night in 2009, a haunted house appeared at the Mine Shack. This menacing mansion had moving statues, paintings that watched you, and puffle pranksters!

name: Fire Dragon
comment: Warriors and princesses alike had to battle this mechanical menace at the end of the Knight's Quest at the Medieval Party. Only by working together could they extinguish his flame and claim the treasure!

name: Puffle Rescue: Underground
comment: Suit up and prepare to go underground! Pink puffles have been lost in the caves below Club Penguin. Jump mine carts, snow cannons, and blasts of steam to succeed.

name: Double Necked Guitar
comment: This powerful instrument first appeared during Music Jam in 2010. It was released by surprise halfway through the festival, so penguins had one more chance to rock out.

name: Puffle Rescue: Ice Floes
comment: Blue puffles need your help! Many are trapped on dangerous ice floes, surrounded by sharks! Jump between chunks of ice, and watch out for cracks to save them.

name: Spy Phone
comment: This ultimate spy gadget has everything an Elite Agent needs. It can receive orders, teleport agents to any location, and even help complete special tasks.

name: Dance Contest
comment: Over at the Night Club, DJ Cadence keeps the Dance Contest going with seriously epic music. Penguins looking to show off their moves can dance solo, or compete with their friends.

name: Crab Costume
comment: This rare costume is available in the Treasure Book catalog. However, Elite Agents on the Herbert's Revenge case will also receive one for a special assignment...

name: Puffle Washer
comment: This high-powered washer will scrub away any mess within just a few seconds. Your puffles will come out fresh and clean every time. Available only in the Pet Shop's Furniture catalog!

name: Green Jackhammer
comment: This unique tool showed up during the Earth Day celebration. Penguins voted it their favorite out of three choices. It can grow tree saplings instantly!

name: The Veggie Villain
comment: To stop the PSA, Herbert needed to break into its computer systems. When a secret agent stopped the attack, Herbert was able to teleport his popcorn device into the HQ and destroy it!

name: Island Lifter 3000
comment: Invented by Gary the Gadget Guy, this powerful device lifted the entire island of Club Penguin into the sky for the Festival of Flight!

name: Flare
comment: One of the Elite Puffles from the Elite Penguin Force. Flare can blow blue fire, which can weld nearly anything together. Agents on the Herbert's Revenge case can summon Flare anytime.

name: Popcorn Device
comment: To destroy the PSA, Herbert P. Bear needed a powerful device. In May of 2010, he built that device–a souped-up popcorn popper!

name: Field-Ops
comment: Elite Agents receive orders every week for important tasks or critical situations. Agents can report for duty by accessing the Field-Ops computer in the Command Room.

name: Recipe for Disaster
comment: When Herbert successfully destroyed the PSA, he celebrated by making all kinds of treats. His gloating would not last long though, as the Elite Penguin Force was soon on his case.

name: Elite Agent
comment: Elite Agents must learn a number of highly specialized skills to complete their tasks. Re-wiring circuits, repowering electronics, and bypassing security systems are just some of the basics!

name: Aunt Arctic Sketch
comment: This Aunt Arctic sketch is fairly recent, and shows her not-often-seen igloo. Because penguins have seen her so often, we always try to draw her in new and interesting poses.

name: Yeti Cave
comment: This peculiar place was discovered at the end of the Great Snow Maze in November 2009. A room fit for any Yeti!

name: Shocktopus
comment: Rescuers must face these high-voltage sea creatures during underwater levels in Puffle Rescue. They're rather shocking to see, and even more so to touch. Avoid at all costs!

name: Puffle Rescue: Underwater
comment: Calling all rescuers: Black puffles are trapped underwater! Suit up and dive in! More than anything, make sure not to sink too far into the deep...

name: Hidden Lake Lock
comment: When the Hidden Lake was discovered, explorers also found a mysterious locked door... underwater. The key was later discovered by Puffle Rescuers, who following a strange shadow...

name: Knight's Quest
comment: The Knight's Quest is an adventure fit for any knight... or princess! Solve all the puzzles to discover untold treasures during the Medieval Party!

name: Puffle Round Up[2]
comment: "Okay, I just need to catch a few more for the Pet Shop. Easy now... steady... steady..." says the penguin, thinking out loud. "It takes real concentration to do this!"

name: Fire Ninja Force
comment: In November 2010, Fire Ninjas gathered and used their powers to help get the water flowing to the new Water Dojo. To become a ninja, head to the Dojo and play Card-Jitsu.

name: Halloween Swamp
comment: In the October 2010 Halloween Party, we waddled through mazes. To open the doors into the Dark Chamber, we had to mimic the creepy organ music.

name: Prepare for Pumpkins
comment: Getting a giant pumpkin to the lighthouse was just one part of the 2010 Halloween Party. Penguins got their costumes ready from the October edition of Penguin Style.

name: Finding Rockhopper
comment: One of the Captain's favorite snacks is surprising... stinky cheese! Even without cheese, you may find Rockhopper on his Migrator ship, when it docks in Club Penguin.

name: Elite Puffle: Flare
comment: Some member penguins entered the Unlock Code from the Club Penguin DS game and got the Elite Puffle, Flare. Its welding skills and blue flames make it intense.

name: Giant Pearl
comment: There are many ways to earn coins in Club Penguin. But the clam that holds the giant pearl in Aqua Grabber might be the sparkliest way of all. Tip: Don't wake up the clam!

name: Water Stamps
comment: Ninjas who play Card-Jitsu Water can earn stamps that will show off their ninja skills. Go to the Dojo and challenge your opponents to race towards the gong at the Waterfall.

name: EPF Agents
comment: Classified Information: Rookie and Jet Pack Guy are rumored to be Elite Penguin Force Agents. Become a secret agent by responding to another agent's invite and taking the test.

name: Puffle Rescue
comment: From the Mine, you can take on the task of rescuing puffles in peril when you play Puffle Rescue. And as you navigate the waters, never forget that creatures like squid and sharks are hot on your flippers.

name: Fire Dojo Challenge
comment: Hone your battle skills by challenging ninja opponents at the Fire Dojo. You'll need patience, practice, power. Also, to master this element and become a Fire Ninja, some hot sauce is recommended.

name: System Defender
comment: On January 13, 2011, the EPF was attacked by enemy bugs. Agents repelled the attack with a new program called System Defender. Now any agent can train in this game at the Command Room.

name: Adventurous Red Puffle
comment: Originally brought to Club Penguin from Rockhopper Island, adventurous red puffles love cannons. You can adopt a red puffle from the Pet Shop.

name: G and the Machine
comment: "It's incredibly complex. A machine made from all sorts of things around the island." During the Wilderness Expedition of January 2011, we were challenged to make the machine work.

name: Enemies of the System
comment: The Ultimate Protobot and his minions wreak havoc in System Defender. Luckily, the Elite Penguin Force has strong defenses to counteract their attempts. Agents, your orders are in the Command Room.

name: Holiday Dojo Lights
comment: At the Holiday Party 2010, the island was brightly lit. How many lights, you ask? Over 1000 bulbs shone bright in the Courtyard alone. Sensei really, really likes decorating.

name: Wii Rollin' Riot
comment: In Club Penguin's Game Day for Wii, the Rollin' Riot game's challenge is to make the biggest snowball... just make sure your opponents don't take yours!

name: EPF Under Attack
comment: In January 2011, Secret Agents were told to report to System Defender in the Command Room. Specialized skills and honed instinct help the Elite Penguin Force. Join by invitation of someone on the squad.

name: Elite Comm Class Agents
comment: Comm class agents of the Elite Penguin Force are the eyes and ears of the island's secret agency. They know information wins battles. Join the EPF today by accepting an invitation from an agent and taking the test.

name: Brown Puffle Cliff
comment: We were excited to go on a Wilderness Expedition in January 2011. Once through the Tree Maze and onto the boat, we crossed a bay and were faced with cliffs and caves. Then we discovered the inventive brown puffle!

name: Coins for Change Goal!
comment: Filling the Lighthouse during Coins for Change 2010 was an awesome challenge. We did it! And the virtual Club Penguin coins meant real donations went to help kids around the globe.

name: Sensei Water Battle
comment: The last step to becoming a Water Ninja is defeating Sensei in battle. Though his skills are legendary, the way to defeating him is dedication. Keep trying, no matter what, and victory will be yours.

name: Green Puffles in Jet Pack Adventure
comment: If you're looking for an edge in the game Jet Pack Adventure, take a green puffle with you. These talented fliers will go around collecting coins, and will look for extra fuel if you start to run out!

name: Water Dojo
comment: The Water Dojo is a place of mist and mystery. Ninjas journey here to train in the ancient art of Card-Jitsu Water. Speak with Sensei to arrange a match. Those who do must be prepared to compete... and to swim.

name: White Puffle[3]
comment: A snowflake. A single sheet of blank paper. A white puffle. Small things can sometimes conceal great power.

name: Yarr[4]
comment: "Avast!" cries Rockhopper. "What be them flares me sees on the horizon? What's that ye say, Yarr? Arr, I think it be a message from me buddies at Club Penguin, too."

name: Keeper of the Boiler Room[5]
comment: "Talk about an incredible job," the Keeper exclaims in the middle of a bounce. "Everyday dancing required and a cheerful nature a must..."

name: Mobile Fire Power Card 1
comment: This card does not appear in real-life, and as such has no description
